display_html:
newtype Cont ans x = Cont {
  • runCont ∷ (x → ans) → ans
}
name: Cont runCont Cont

display_html:
newtype Collect tuple = Collect {
  • runCollect ∷ ∀ ans. ans → (tuple → ans → ans) → ans
}
name: Collect runCollect Collect

display_html: fixAction ∷ Collect tuple → ans → (tuple → ans → ans) → ans
name: fixAction

name: mapify

name: listify

name: count

name: one

name: none

display_html: front ∷ t → Collect t → Collect t
name: front

display_html: rear ∷ Collect t → t → Collect t
name: rear

display_html: when ∷ Bool → Collect ()
name: when

name: takeC

name: isempty

display_html: nonempty ∷ Collect t → Bool
name: nonempty

name: hasElem

display_html:
newtype ColPlus tuple = ColPlus {
  • runColPlus ∷ ∀ ans. ans → (tuple → ans → ans) → (ans → ans → ans) → ans
}
name: ColPlus runColPlus ColPlus

display_html: runPlus ∷ Monoid a ⇒ ColPlus t → a → (t → a → a) → a
name: runPlus

display_html:
class Iter f where
  • nxt ∷ f a b → Collect (a, b, f a b)
  • lub ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → f k b → Collect (k, b, f k b)
  • hasNxt ∷ f a b → Maybe (a, b, f a b)
  • hasLub ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → f k b → Maybe (k, b, f k b)
  • haskey ∷ Ord key ⇒ key → f key b → Bool
  • isnull ∷ f k v → Bool
  • lookup ∷ Ord key ⇒ key → f key rng → Maybe rng
  • element ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → f k v → Collect ()
name: Iter isnull haskey hasLub hasNxt lub nxt element lookup

display_html:
class Basic f where
  • addpair ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → v → f k v → f k v
  • addkv ∷ Ord k ⇒ (k, v) → f k v → (v → v → v) → f k v
  • removekey ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → f k v → f k v
  • domain ∷ Ord k ⇒ f k v → Set k
  • range ∷ Ord v ⇒ f k v → Set v
name: Basic removekey addkv addpair range domain

display_html:
data BaseRep f k v where
  • MapR ∷ Basic Map ⇒ BaseRep Map k v
  • SetR ∷ Basic Sett ⇒ BaseRep Sett k ()
  • ListR ∷ Basic List ⇒ BaseRep List k v
  • SingleR ∷ Basic Single ⇒ BaseRep Single k v
name: BaseRep SingleR ListR SetR MapR

display_html:
data List k v where
  • UnSafeList ∷ Ord k ⇒ [(k, v)] → List k v
name: List UnSafeList

display_html: unList ∷ List k v → [(k, v)]
name: unList

display_html: fromPairs ∷ Ord k ⇒ (v → v → v) → [(k, v)] → List k v
name: fromPairs

display_html: normalize ∷ Ord k ⇒ (v → v → v) → [(k, v)] → [(k, v)]
name: normalize

display_html:
data Single k v where
  • Single ∷ k → v → Single k v
  • Fail ∷ Single k v
  • SetSingle ∷ k → Single k ()
name: Single SetSingle Single Fail

display_html:
data Sett k v where
  • Sett ∷ Set k → Sett k ()
name: Sett Sett

display_html:
class Embed concrete base | concrete → base where
  • toBase ∷ concrete → base
  • fromBase ∷ base → concrete
name: Embed fromBase toBase

display_html:
data Exp t where
  • Base ∷ (Ord k, Basic f, Iter f) ⇒ BaseRep f k v → f k v → Exp (f k v)
  • Dom ∷ Ord k ⇒ Exp (f k v) → Exp (Sett k ())
  • Rng ∷ (Ord k, Ord v) ⇒ Exp (f k v) → Exp (Sett v ())
  • DRestrict ∷ (Ord k, Iter g) ⇒ Exp (g k ()) → Exp (f k v) → Exp (f k v)
  • DExclude ∷ (Ord k, Iter g) ⇒ Exp (g k ()) → Exp (f k v) → Exp (f k v)
  • RRestrict ∷ (Ord k, Iter g, Ord v) ⇒ Exp (f k v) → Exp (g v ()) → Exp (f k v)
  • RExclude ∷ (Ord k, Iter g, Ord v) ⇒ Exp (f k v) → Exp (g v ()) → Exp (f k v)
  • Elem ∷ (Ord k, Iter g, Show k) ⇒ k → Exp (g k ()) → Exp Bool
  • NotElem ∷ (Ord k, Iter g, Show k) ⇒ k → Exp (g k ()) → Exp Bool
  • Intersect ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g) ⇒ Exp (f k v) → Exp (g k u) → Exp (Sett k ())
  • Subset ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g) ⇒ Exp (f k v) → Exp (g k u) → Exp Bool
  • SetDiff ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g) ⇒ Exp (f k v) → Exp (g k u) → Exp (f k v)
  • UnionOverrideLeft ∷ (Show k, Show v, Ord k) ⇒ Exp (f k v) → Exp (g k v) → Exp (f k v)
  • UnionPlus ∷ (Ord k, Monoid n) ⇒ Exp (f k n) → Exp (g k n) → Exp (f k n)
  • UnionOverrideRight ∷ Ord k ⇒ Exp (f k v) → Exp (g k v) → Exp (f k v)
  • Singleton ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → v → Exp (Single k v)
  • SetSingleton ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → Exp (Single k ())
  • KeyEqual ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g) ⇒ Exp (f k v) → Exp (g k u) → Exp Bool
name: Exp KeyEqual SetSingleton UnionOverrideRight UnionPlus UnionOverrideLeft SetDiff Subset Intersect NotElem RExclude RRestrict DExclude DRestrict Rng Dom Base Singleton Elem

display_html:
class HasExp s t | s → t where

name: unionplus

display_html: data Fun t = Fun (Lam t) t
name: Fun Fun

display_html:
data Pat env t where
  • P1 ∷ Pat (d, c, b, a) d
  • P2 ∷ Pat (d, c, b, a) c
  • P3 ∷ Pat (d, c, b, a) b
  • P4 ∷ Pat (d, c, b, a) a
  • PPair ∷ Pat (d, c, b, a) a → Pat (d, c, b, a) b → Pat (d, c, b, a) (a, b)
name: Pat PPair P4 P3 P2 P1

display_html:
data Expr env t where
  • X1 ∷ Expr (d, c, b, a) d
  • X2 ∷ Expr (d, c, b, a) c
  • X3 ∷ Expr (d, c, b, a) b
  • X4 ∷ Expr (d, c, b, a) a
  • HasKey ∷ (Iter f, Ord k) ⇒ Expr e k → f k v → Expr e Bool
  • Neg ∷ Expr e Bool → Expr e Bool
  • Ap ∷ Lam (a → b → c) → Expr e a → Expr e b → Expr e c
  • EPair ∷ Expr e a → Expr e b → Expr e (a, b)
  • FST ∷ Expr e (a, b) → Expr e a
  • SND ∷ Expr e (a, b) → Expr e b
  • Lit ∷ Show t ⇒ t → Expr env t
name: Expr SND FST EPair HasKey X4 X3 X2 X1 Neg Ap Lit

display_html:
data Lam t where
  • Lam ∷ Pat (d, c, b, a) t → Pat (d, c, b, a) s → Expr (d, c, b, a) v → Lam (t → s → v)
  • Add ∷ Num n ⇒ Lam (n → n → n)
  • Cat ∷ Monoid m ⇒ Lam (m → m → m)
  • Eql ∷ Eq t ⇒ Lam (t → t → Bool)
  • Both ∷ Lam (Bool → Bool → Bool)
  • Lift ∷ (a → b → c) → Lam (a → b → c)
name: Lam Both Add Lam Cat Eql Lift

display_html:
data Query k v where
  • BaseD ∷ (Iter f, Ord k) ⇒ BaseRep f k v → f k v → Query k v
  • ProjectD ∷ Ord k ⇒ Query k v → Fun (k → v → u) → Query k u
  • AndD ∷ Ord k ⇒ Query k v → Query k w → Query k (v, w)
  • ChainD ∷ (Ord k, Ord v) ⇒ Query k v → Query v w → Fun (k → (v, w) → u) → Query k u
  • AndPD ∷ Ord k ⇒ Query k v → Query k u → Fun (k → (v, u) → w) → Query k w
  • OrD ∷ Ord k ⇒ Query k v → Query k v → Fun (v → v → v) → Query k v
  • GuardD ∷ Ord k ⇒ Query k v → Fun (k → v → Bool) → Query k v
  • DiffD ∷ Ord k ⇒ Query k v → Query k u → Query k v
name: Query DiffD GuardD OrD AndPD ChainD AndD ProjectD BaseD

class Basic f where
  • addpair ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → v → f k v → f k v
  • addkv ∷ Ord k ⇒ (k, v) → f k v → (v → v → v) → f k v
  • removekey ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → f k v → f k v

  • range ∷ Ord v ⇒ f k v → Set v
name: Basic domain range addpair addkv removekey

display_html:
class Iter f where
  • nxt ∷ f a b → Collect (a, b, f a b)
  • lub ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → f k b → Collect (k, b, f k b)
  • hasNxt ∷ f a b → Maybe (a, b, f a b)
  • hasLub ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → f k b → Maybe (k, b, f k b)
  • haskey ∷ Ord key ⇒ key → f key b → Bool
  • isnull ∷ f k v → Bool
  • lookup ∷ Ord key ⇒ key → f key rng → Maybe rng
  • element ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → f k v → Collect ()
name: Iter lookup element nxt lub hasNxt hasLub haskey isnull

class HasExp s t | s → t where

  • fromBase ∷ base → concrete

display_html:
data BaseRep f k v where
  • MapR ∷ Basic Map ⇒ BaseRep Map k v
  • SetR ∷ Basic Sett ⇒ BaseRep Sett k ()
  • ListR ∷ Basic List ⇒ BaseRep List k v
  • SingleR ∷ Basic Single ⇒ BaseRep Single k v
name: BaseRep MapR SetR ListR SingleR

display_html:
data Exp t where

display_html: rexclude ∷ (Ord k, Iter g, Ord v, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g v ())) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
name: rexclude

display_html: rrestrict ∷ (Ord k, Iter g, Ord v, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g v ())) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
name: rrestrict

display_html: unionleft ∷ (Show k, Show v, Ord k, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k v)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
name: unionleft

display_html: unionright ∷ (Ord k, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k v)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
name: unionright

display_html: unionplus ∷ (Ord k, Monoid n, HasExp s1 (f k n), HasExp s2 (g k n)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k n)
name: unionplus

display_html: singleton ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → v → Exp (Single k v)
name: singleton

display_html: setSingleton ∷ Ord k ⇒ k → Exp (Single k ())
name: setSingleton

display_html: intersect ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k u)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (Sett k ())
name: intersect

display_html: subset ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k u)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp Bool
name: subset

display_html: keyeq ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k u)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp Bool
name: keyeq

display_html: (◁) ∷ (Ord k, HasExp s1 (Sett k ()), HasExp s2 (f k v)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
(⋪) ∷ (Ord k, Iter g, HasExp s1 (g k ()), HasExp s2 (f k v)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
(▷) ∷ (Ord k, Iter g, Ord v, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g v ())) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
(⋫) ∷ (Ord k, Iter g, Ord v, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g v ())) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
(∈) ∷ (Show k, Ord k, Iter g, HasExp s (g k ())) ⇒ k → s → Exp Bool
(∉) ∷ (Show k, Ord k, Iter g, HasExp s (g k ())) ⇒ k → s → Exp Bool
(∪) ∷ (Show k, Show v, Ord k, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k v)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
(⨃) ∷ (Ord k, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k v)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
(∪+) ∷ (Ord k, Monoid n, HasExp s1 (f k n), HasExp s2 (g k n)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k n)
(∩) ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k u)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (Sett k ())
(⊆) ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k u)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp Bool
(≍) ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k u)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp Bool
(<|) ∷ (Ord k, HasExp s1 (Sett k ()), HasExp s2 (f k v)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
(|>) ∷ (Ord k, Iter g, Ord v, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g v ())) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
(➖) ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k u)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
keysEqual ∷ Ord k ⇒ Map k v1 → Map k v2 → Bool
name: keysEqual

display_html: setdiff ∷ (Ord k, Iter f, Iter g, HasExp s1 (f k v), HasExp s2 (g k u)) ⇒ s1 → s2 → Exp (f k v)
name: setdiff

display_html: materialize ∷ Ord k ⇒ BaseRep f k v → Collect (k, v) → f k v
name: materialize

display_html: fromList ∷ Ord k ⇒ BaseRep f k v → (v → v → v) → [(k, v)] → f k v
name: fromList
